summary.source_name: DGSSI + OMPIC + SGG + Adala (Ministere de la Justice)
summary.notes: Expanded corpus of 34 laws covering cybersecurity, data protection, electronic transactions, trust services, telecommunications, intellectual property, commercial law, cloud qualification, and foundational codes (Constitution, Code penal, Code de commerce, Code du travail, DOC). DGSSI portal (primary, accessible), OMPIC (industrial property, accessible), SGG/Adala (foundational codes, currently inaccessible -- require VPN or future retry). 5 foundational codes added as metadata-only pending SGG/Adala access. 7 new DGSSI decrees/arretes added (Arrete 3-17-25 Cloud qualification, Decret 2-21-406 cybersecurity implementation, etc.).
